title: Ep 102 - Absolute Gratitude
itunes:title: Ep 102 - Absolute Gratitude
description:
Gratitude is one of the most important things that you can learn to practice daily. It make you put your life into perspective and when you are grateful, you are happy. In this episode I speak about the lessons I learned from my trip to Nicaragua and how much gratitude I gained from the trip for my 30th birthday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
